attributes.comment:
As someone who is very dependent on USCIS in the adoption of her children, I am
very grateful for their help and assistance but I am very perplexed on why the
paperwork we have already done expires before we are able to bring our little one
home and now not only will we have to redo everything, which will cost us several
thousands of additional dollars, we are now also having to face a rate increase. I
understand the need for "border control", but there should be different regulations
for benevolent adoptions. Thank you for letting me express myself. Thank you for
allowing international adoptions.
Bonnie
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Bonnie
